macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 7.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to even.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.
